songs.title: Mercy
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, uh
Weekly 16's!
Yeah, OK, check!

[Verse]
It's me Timothy here to save the day
Never gon' leave bitch I'm here to stay
Metta World Peace with the fade away
And I'm looking so good I got a fade today
I keep it real, soul body and mind
Flow hotter than Sriracha and Wasabi combined
I'm sipping lime and Bacardi when it's partying time
My bitch got ass like Atlanta but she Hollywood fine
I don't give a damn watchu telling me
Winning competition you a fail to me
I'm a Beast in the game, you like Bell to me
They be feeling my words, like braille ya see?
So all these groupies around and on the side of me
Offering up they bodies 'cuz they naughty for that sodomy
Using too much teeth when she was nobbing me and slobbing me
Scratching up my wood, I told her: "Bitch that is mahogany!"

[Hook]
Okay Lamborghini Mercy
Your chick, she so thirsty
I'm in that two-seat Lambo with your girl
She tryna jerk me
Okay Lamborghini Mercy
Your chick, she so thirsty
I'm in that two-seat Lambo with your girl
She tryna jerk me
